project1.title: KebunJio
project1.description: A gardening platform (web & mobile) for home gardeners. Website has forums and event listings. Mobile app has plant tracker, reminders, AI diagnosis, and activity logs.

project2.title: Shopping Cart
project2.description: Mock e-commerce site with product viewing, cart, checkout, and admin product CRUD.

project3.title: Card Match Game
project3.description: Android card matching game using custom image sets. Includes timer and leaderboard.

project4.title: NCKU Book Market
project4.description: A secondhand book marketplace for NCKU students with user listings, comments, and profiles.

project5.title: Chicken Runner Game
project5.description: 2-player chicken racing game inspired by Mario Kart with themed maps and mystery blocks.

project6.title: Viking Runner Game
project6.description: An endless runner game with Viking theme.

project7.title: YouTube Comment Sentiment Analysis
project7.description: App that analyzes sentiment of YouTube comments using Python NLP.

project8.title: Smart Chatbot for NCKU Queries
project8.description: Chatbot for answering NCKU queries based on sentence similarity and AI models.

project9.title: Fruit Recognition CNN model
project9.description: Train a CNN model to classify fruit images.
